Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.world.influence

Class StandardInfluence

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.world.influence.StandardInfluence
All Implemented Interfaces:
InfluenceStrategy
public class StandardInfluence extends Object implements InfluenceStrategy
StandardInfluence class contains the method getInfluence utilized to calculate the influence of an island for a single player, when no characterInfluence.

  • Method Details

    • getInfluence

      public int getInfluence(Island i, Player p, Optional<ColorS> color, HashMap<ColorS,Player> profs)
      Method getInfluence calculates the standard influence on the island i, for the player p (given by parameter).
      Specified by:
      getInfluence in interface InfluenceStrategy
      Parameters:
      i - Island - the Island on which the influence has to be calculated.
      p - Player - the player for whom the influence is calculated.
      color - Optional ColorS - the banned color used by the class NoColorInfluence.
      profs - HashMap ColorS, Player - the Map contains the prof (memorized as a ColorS) and the owner.
      Returns:
      the value of the influence.
